questions.question: A retail company uses a machine learning model for product recommendations. The monitoring system detects a sudden increase in the number of null values in the input data. What would be the most appropriate automated remediation strategy?
options: Notify the site reliability engineers to investigate the application components responsible for data ingestion.
Scale out the inference infrastructure to handle the increased data volume.
Update the business KPIs to account for the null values in the input data.
Retrain the model with the new data to adapt to the null values.
correct_answers: Notify the site reliability engineers to investigate the application components responsible for data ingestion.
questions.topic: 4.1 Monitor Model Performance and Data Quality
